Often times members begin telling the MES a lot of information throughout the call and they would like to document it during the call. Currently if they start a call outcome and click off the tab they will lose the notes they started.

I'd like to apply Domain Driven Design principles to autosaving. Essentially, the domain here is that there's an ctive call in the background, and the MS person is moving quickly. We should easily be able to make any part of the form auto-savable. Let's think through the design carefully before we start writing code.
